## IPackedDIDCommMessage interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

The result of packing a DIDComm v2 message. The message is always serialized as string.

This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IPackedDIDCommMessage
```

## Properties

| Property                                               | Modifiers | Type   | Description  |
| ------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ------ | ------------ |
| [message](./did-comm.ipackeddidcommmessage.message.md) |           | string | **_(BETA)_** |
